rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DTCNW-PL;6f2b1016.1503">   <title>NWDTC Allocation Committee 13-03-15 </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DTCNW-PL;6f2b1016.1503</link>   <description> Dear all,<br><br>I'm emailing to confirm the schedule for this Friday's Allocation Committee. The meeting will take place in the Roscoe Building, room 3.9 (Building no. 53 on the Manchester Campus Map&lt;http://documents.manchester.ac.uk/display.aspx?DocID=6507&gt;). Please note that tea and coffee will be available in the room next door (3.1/3.8) and you'll be called in when your session is ready to start. [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2015-03-11T12:45:56+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Meloy, Hayley</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DTCNW-PL;6f2b1016.1503</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DTCNW-PL;38f7c70f.1503">   <title>Re: AQM Applications Update </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DTCNW-PL;38f7c70f.1503</link>   <description> My apologies, I’ve sent this to the wrong mailing list - please disregard this email.<br><br>Best wishes,<br>Hayley<br><br>From: Meloy, Hayley<br>Sent: 03 March 2015 16:38<br>To: 'DTCNW-PL@JISCMAIL.AC.UK'<br>Subject: AQM Applications Update<br>Importance: High<br><br>Dear all,<br><br>My apologies \ufffd\ufffd\ufffd I overlooked one AQM application as the coversheet was not completed in full. Please find the additional application attached, with an updated spreadsheet. [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2015-03-03T16:55:52+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Meloy, Hayley</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DTCNW-PL;38f7c70f.1503</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DTCNW-PL;fc39ee1.1503">   <title>AQM Applications Update </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DTCNW-PL;fc39ee1.1503</link>   <description> Dear all,<br><br>My apologies - I overlooked one AQM application as the coversheet was not completed in full. Please find the additional application attached, with an updated spreadsheet.<br><br>One of the AccFin candidates, Braun has also dropped out of the competition.<br><br>Best wishes,<br>Hayley<br><br>Hayley Meloy | North West Doctoral Training Centre Administrator<br>Room 106, Eleanor Rathbone Building<br>Bedford Street South<br>Liverpool, L69 7ZA<br>0151 794 1482<br>www.nwdtc.ac.uk&lt;http://www.nwdtc.ac.uk/&gt;    </description>   <dc:date>2015-03-03T16:37:39+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Meloy, Hayley</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DTCNW-PL;fc39ee1.1503</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DTCNW-PL;a5e5dc4.1502">   <title>Allocation Committee 13-03-15 </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DTCNW-PL;a5e5dc4.1502</link>   <description> Dear all,<br><br>The preliminary schedule for the Allocation Committee in Manchester (exact venue TBC) on the 13th March is as follows:<br><br>10:00 - 11:00 Session 1<br>Psychology<br>Health and Wellbeing<br>Linguistics<br>Language Based Area Studies<br>Social Anthropology<br><br>11:15 - 12:15 Session 2<br>Geography and Environment<br>Development and Humanitarianism<br>Planning and Environment<br>Economic and Social History<br>Politics in a Global World<br><br>13:15 - 14:15 Session 3<br>Economics<br>Business and Management<br>Accounting and Finance<br>Security, Conflict and Justice<br>Educational Research [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2015-02-18T12:21:19+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Meloy, Hayley</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DTCNW-PL;a5e5dc4.1502</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DTCNW-PL;4361f04.1502">   <title>Re: DTC Pathways (Liverpool) Mapping Social Science Training Provision </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DTCNW-PL;4361f04.1502</link>   <description> Dear Hayley,<br><br>Do you know of any applications for this round of open studentships from Liverpool (please see correspondence below)? If there are any, they need to be sent to our pathway lead by the end of next week.<br><br>Regards,<br><br>Tim<br><br>From: Kierans, Ciara [mailto:C.Kierans@liverpool.ac.uk]<br>Sent: 04 February 2015 09:30<br>To: Tim Martineau; Sally Theobald<br>Subject: RE: DTC Pathways (Liverpool) Mapping Social Science Training Provision [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2015-02-05T07:55:56+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Tim Martineau</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DTCNW-PL;4361f04.1502</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DTCNW-PL;847495cc.1501">   <title>Studentship Competition </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DTCNW-PL;847495cc.1501</link>   <description> Dear Pathway Leads,<br><br>Please find attached the coversheet for use in this year's studentship ranking process.<br><br>The deadline for students to submit their application documents to School PGR Administrators is next Monday (2nd February). Final lists of candidates for the Allocation Committee, ranked and with completed cover sheets, should be submitted to me by the 27th February by overall pathway leads. Please see the Studentship Guidance for Staff&lt;http://documents.manchester.ac.uk/display.aspx?DocID=18902&gt; on our website for more information about the process you should be following and the ranking/scoring criteria. [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2015-01-28T11:18:43+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Meloy, Hayley</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DTCNW-PL;847495cc.1501</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DTCNW-PL;5ce8e821.1501">   <title>Re: Pathway Forum 20-01-15 </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DTCNW-PL;5ce8e821.1501</link>   <description> Dear all,<br><br>Just to clarify, we just need one pathway lead to attend from each pathway. This would usually be the overall pathway lead, but institutional pathway leads (or failing that, informed colleagues) could represent if the overall pathway lead is not available.<br><br>Best wishes,<br>Hayley<br><br>From: Meloy, Hayley<br>Sent: 13 January 2015 16:42<br>To: DTCNW-PL@JISCMAIL.AC.UK<br>Cc: Batey, Peter; Maja Zehfuss (Maja.Zehfuss@manchester.ac.uk); 'Gatrell, Caroline' (c.gatrell@lancaster.ac.uk); Kierans, Ciara; Nichola Ellis; Heard, James; Mythen, Gabe<br>Subject: Pathway Forum 20-01-15 [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2015-01-14T11:09:50+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Meloy, Hayley</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DTCNW-PL;5ce8e821.1501</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DTCNW-PL;89498d35.1501">   <title>Pathway Forum 20-01-15 </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DTCNW-PL;89498d35.1501</link>   <description> Dear all,<br><br>Please find attached the agenda for the Pathway Forum on the 20th January. This will take place 1-3pm in Seminar Room 4 of the University of Liverpool Management School (building 427 on the campus map: https://www.liv.ac.uk/files/docs/maps/liverpool-university-campus-map.pdf).<br><br>Can each pathway please confirm who will be in attendance at this meeting, if you have not already done so. The pathway representative will be asked to speak for a maximum of 3 minutes on your pathway's DTC Objectives report that was submitted last month. [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2015-01-13T16:42:21+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Meloy, Hayley</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DTCNW-PL;89498d35.1501</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DTCNW-PL;a04376fd.1411">   <title>CASE Competition - Coversheet </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DTCNW-PL;a04376fd.1411</link>   <description> Dear all,<br><br>Please find attached the coversheet for use in this CASE competition. A coversheet should be completed for each application which is to be submitted to the allocation committee. Both coversheets and applications should be sent to me by the 21st November.<br><br>Please particularly note Section 4 on supervisory capacity. This section has been introduced on both the CASE and Standard competition coversheets as supervisory capacity will now be formally considered during the allocation committee meeting. Therefore, please be sure to complete this as fully as possible. [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2014-11-11T10:28:39+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Meloy, Hayley</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DTCNW-PL;a04376fd.1411</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DTCNW-PL;20f8158a.1411">   <title>CASE Competition </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DTCNW-PL;20f8158a.1411</link>   <description> Dear all,<br><br>Just a reminder that the CASE Application deadline is today. Applicants will submit their applications to the appropriate institutional pathway lead in the first instance, then the pathway needs to undertake a ranking process (as appropriate) and send all the applications that are to be considered by the allocation committee to me by the 21st November. [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2014-11-07T15:24:30+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Meloy, Hayley</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DTCNW-PL;20f8158a.1411</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DTCNW-PL;84456a80.1410">   <title>Pathway Forums </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DTCNW-PL;84456a80.1410</link>   <description> Dear all,<br><br>There will be a Pathway Forum on the 14th October, for which I attach the agenda. The overall pathway lead for each pathway was notified of this in September and institutional pathway leads are not expected to attend \ufffd\ufffd\ufffd I am just circulating the agenda for information.<br><br>Where the overall pathway lead is not able to attend, they have been asked to find an institutional pathway lead to represent the pathway, or failing that a suitable colleague. [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2014-10-10T16:19:18+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Meloy, Hayley</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DTCNW-PL;84456a80.1410</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DTCNW-PL;dd9a3a61.1409">   <title>Studentship Competitions </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DTCNW-PL;dd9a3a61.1409</link>   <description> Dear all,<br><br>The paperwork for the 2014/15 CASE Competition&lt;http://www.nwdtc.ac.uk/collaboration/case-studentship-competition/&gt; and Standard/Open Studentship Competition&lt;http://www.nwdtc.ac.uk/how-to-apply/&gt; is now online. Please see attached the schedules for both processes.<br><br>The Studentship Application Guidance for Staff&lt;http://documents.manchester.ac.uk/display.aspx?DocID=18902&gt; will be updated shortly.<br><br>I hope everyone had a pleasant summer!<br><br>Best wishes,<br>Hayley<br><br>Hayley Meloy | North West Doctoral Training Centre Administrator<br>Room 106, Eleanor Rathbone Building<br>Bedford Street South<br>Liverpool, L69 7ZA<br>0151 794 1482<br>www.nwdtc.ac.uk&lt;http://www.nwdtc.ac.uk/&gt;    </description>   <dc:date>2014-09-09T16:09:32+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Meloy, Hayley</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DTCNW-PL;dd9a3a61.1409</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DTCNW-PL;f97f0df7.1406">   <title>FW: Newton Fund: UK and Chile International Collaboration Programme </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DTCNW-PL;f97f0df7.1406</link>   <description> Dear all,<br><br>Please see below an email from the ESRC concerning a new initiative which may be of interest.<br><br>Best wishes,<br>Hayley<br><br>Hayley Meloy | North West Doctoral Training Centre Administrator<br>Room 106, Eleanor Rathbone Building<br>Bedford Street South<br>Liverpool, L69 7ZA<br>0151 794 1482<br>www.nwdtc.ac.uk&lt;http://www.nwdtc.ac.uk/&gt;<br><br>Dear all,<br><br>Please find attached a link to information regarding an International Cooperation Programme supporting research collaboration between the UK and Chile, as part of the Newton Fund. http://www.rcuk.ac.uk/international/funding/collaboration/newton/ [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2014-06-18T14:09:54+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Meloy, Hayley</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DTCNW-PL;f97f0df7.1406</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DTCNW-PL;f24cf97e.1405">   <title>Joint research seminar of NWDTC Advanced quantitative methods, engage@liverpool and SoES - Dr Johan Koskinen - Wednesday 4th June at 16:15 </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DTCNW-PL;f24cf97e.1405</link>   <description>Full message available at: <a href="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DTCNW-PL;f24cf97e.1405">Joint research seminar of NWDTC Advanced quantitative methods, engage@liverpool and SoES - Dr Johan Koskinen - Wednesday 4th June at 16:15 </a></description>   <dc:date>2014-05-30T15:55:17+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Kulu, Hill</dc:creator> rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DTCNW-PL;ae039717.1405">   <title>AQM mini-symposium in Liverpool on 4th June; registration by 30th May </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DTCNW-PL;ae039717.1405</link>   <description> Dear Colleagues,<br><br>AQM mini-symposium will be held on Wednesday 4th June in Liverpool. The symposium will start with presentations by second-year AQM students and will end with a keynote lecture by Dr Johan Koskinen (University of Manchester) on \ufffd\ufffd\ufffdKnowing me, knowing you - are social relations amenable to statistical modelling?\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd. The programme is attached. [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2014-05-28T16:18:52+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Meloy, Hayley</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DTCNW-PL;ae039717.1405</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DTCNW-PL;3da5f52.1405">   <title>AQM mini-symposium in Liverpool on 4th June; registration by 30th May </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DTCNW-PL;3da5f52.1405</link>   <description> Dear Colleagues,<br><br>AQM mini-symposium will be held on Wednesday 4th June in Liverpool. The symposium will start with presentations by second-year AQM students and will end with a keynote lecture by Dr Johan Koskinen (University of Manchester) on \ufffd\ufffd\ufffdKnowing me, knowing you - are social relations amenable to statistical modelling?\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd. The programme is attached. [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2014-05-23T15:06:23+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Kulu, Hill</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DTCNW-PL;3da5f52.1405</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DTCNW-PL;b5d3f3aa.1404">   <title>Pathway Events Fund </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DTCNW-PL;b5d3f3aa.1404</link>   <description> Dear all,<br><br>I'd just like to flag up a couple of changes that have been made to the Pathway Event paperwork (please see attached). The key change is that applications will be processed on a monthly basis, and not just as and when they come in. As more applications are being received now, the ad hoc arrangement is getting harder to manage and I'm concerned that I might miss something. The monthly application deadline means I can keep a better handle on what's coming in and can guarantee a timely response. The other minor change is to allow the funds [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2014-04-23T15:46:00+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Meloy, Hayley</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DTCNW-PL;b5d3f3aa.1404</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DTCNW-PL;b626f21e.1404">   <title>Website </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DTCNW-PL;b626f21e.1404</link>   <description> Dear all,<br><br>The redesigned NWDTC website has now gone live (www.nwdtc.ac.uk&lt;http://www.nwdtc.ac.uk&gt;). I welcome any feedback or ideas for further improvements.<br><br>Eligible programmes are now listed in full for each pathway with links to the relevant departmental pages - please do let me know if you spot any errors or broken links here. If you have any further content you would like added to the page, or any changes, please let me know. [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2014-04-17T15:13:22+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Meloy, Hayley</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DTCNW-PL;b626f21e.1404</dc:identifier> </item>   </rdf:RDF>
